attributes.action: make it a priority of his government to try and bring the 2018 World Cup in England
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Association Football is one of England's biggest exports and continues to be the undisputed most popular sport in the World, and after 52 years should return to England.

Contrary to belief, the cost of staging the FIFA World Cup would be very minimal, we have the best football stadiums in the world as it is, and by 2018 there will be at least ten football grounds in England with a capacity of 50,000- far in excess of FIFA requirements. This is the home of football, this country lives and breathes football, the Country grinds to a halt when England are playing in tournament. It is argubly the biggest part of our national culture, it is only fair that you do your very upmost to bring the World Cup home (in more ways than one).
